servinfo.title: Whistling sound is heard from A/C evaporator

condition.ptxt: Whistling sound is heard from A/C evaporator

ps.ptxt: Depending on the combination of the interior / exterior temperatures, engine rpm and refrigerant pressure, the refrigerant flowing out of the expansion valve may, under certain conditions, make a whistling sound

paragroup.ptxt: At times, slightly decreasing refrigerant volume may stop this noise.
Inspect expansion valve and replace if faulty.
